title: I am in class 10, and I need to start topics of class 11. I have almost all the books. How should I proceed? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey! As you have all the books just start reading these books you have not mentioned which stream you’re so i am consider it to be scince with math. Just know this Physic and chemistry have some theory parts so you can just use your books and try to get grip over that theory. Once you have grip over that theory then you can move to numerical. Just solve chapters one by one don’t panic about the size of the books and course. If you’re from other streams just start by reading your books and you’ll automatically know what you need to do next. If you’re planing to appear for some competition exams like JEE and others. Then you must work hard for that ans solve each and every chapter of your book. HOW TO CRACK JEE MAIN I hope you got it. follow for more, join Schoolokay space.
